amendment.description: Amendment prohibits campaigns from providing currency to individuals to promote election day turnout.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit campaigns from providing currency to individuals for the purpose of encouraging turnout on the date of election.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Northup to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Northup amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 284 - 114 (Roll No. 308).
